titleStmt.title: Strange news from the deep being a full account of a large prodigious whale, lately taken in the river Wivner, within six miles of Colchester : declaring the strange manner of its coming up, by what unusuall means it was seized upon by the neighboring inhabitants : also an account of the like prodigious accidents in general.

notesStmt.note: Contains ill. on t.p. and at end of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
